sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './hotelguestlove.css' import useFetch from "../hooks/fetch" const HotelGuestLove = () => { const {data,loading,error}=useFetch("http://localhost:3001/api/hotel?featured=true&limit=4") console.log(data) return (
Hotel guested love
{loading?"Loading": <>
{data.map((hotel,index)=>(
Hotel
Phú Quốc
Starting 500.000 vnđ
9.0
Excellent
))}
}
) } export default HotelGuestLove
